name: Just Another Clicker Game
description:
Monster Tapper Clicker Game - Just Another Clicker Game !

In this game you will break your thumbs in attempt to destroy all the monsters hiding in the dungeon. As you kill monsters you will collect their souls. Spend souls on upgrading your passive damage or spend the souls on a critical strike Arrow attack.

Level up every 50 souls gathered. Your level will reset and does not get saved, your level is relevant to the current game session you are playing, so reach the highest level you can. 

Just Another Clicker Game was made with Phaser 3 using HTML 

-Created by Derrik Pollock
